channel.title: Beam Sound: Issue or Normal?
channel.description: I noticed something weird about Beam from the Destiny pack and wanted to know if it was something that everyone experienced. In the left ear, it sounds normal, but in the right ear, it sounds like it's one key higher. Is this just how the sound is?

item.title: Beam Sound: Issue or Normal?
item.dc:creator: The_Osprey
item.description:
I think that’s just what the sample for beam they use sounds like… I’m not really sure.

Read full topic

item.title: Beam Sound: Issue or Normal?
item.dc:creator: Aadam
item.description:
hmm…I used to use beam a lot. Let me see if it’s normal or a glitch.

Read full topic

item.title: Beam Sound: Issue or Normal?
item.dc:creator: Tolberto
item.description:
hmm, not sure. As a frequent Beam user, it could just be that it has lots of voices of unison which are all detuned slightly from one another, and the left ear just happens to have more voices which are pitched up slightly. I am probably completely wrong on this.

Read full topic

item.title: Beam Sound: Issue or Normal?
item.dc:creator: BenVacca
item.description:
it sounds like its on glide or something when its panned.

Read full topic

item.title: Beam Sound: Issue or Normal?
item.dc:creator: BenVacca
item.description:
omg it does sound like that. that’s odd

Read full topic
